entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
